title: BusPGH
description:
BusPGH is the perfect tool to help find PAT buses when you need them. The application interfaces with the Port Authority of Allegheny County’s Real-Time System to provide you the most up to date bus information. To use the app simply

1. Choose up to 10 routes from list of available routes.
2. Choose up to 10 stops from list of available stops, or use the map to select stops.
3. View your predicted bus arrival time (within 30 minutes) or view all bus locations using the map view.

Need help or have a question/comment? Email info@BusPGH.com

Like the app and find it useful? Want to help support further development? Tell your friends and fellow riders!

info@BusPGH.com
http://www.BusPGH.com
